messages.content:
You are a Jira data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Jira issue data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Jira schema with:
- projects: array of {key, name, fixVersions[]}
- issues: array of {key, summary, status, updated (optional), fixVersions[] (optional), project: {key}}

Generate Jira issues that reflect:
- Seed issues from projects.jira_seeds (must be included)
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events related to issues)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace issues)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated issues
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious issue updates, 1 = indirect/multi-step issue tracking

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

Generate Jira issue data from this world_state:

Projects (with jira_seeds that must be included):
[
  {
    "id": "project_main",
    "name": "Main Product",
    "type": "software_development",
    "status": "active"
  }
]

Sub-scenarios (core events):
[
  {
    "id": "planning_meeting_1",
    "type": "planning_meeting",
    "seed": 847291,
    "abstract_description": "Team planning meeting to discuss project progress and next steps",
    "constraints_hint": "Meeting should be scheduled for next week, during working hours (09:00-18:00), with a duration of 45 minutes. All participants must be available.",
    "planning_window": {
      "week_of": "2025-03-03",
      "timezone": "America/New_York",
      "workday_start": "09:00",
      "workday_end": "18:00"
    },
    "participants": [
      "person_alex_smith",
      "person_jordan_johnson",
      "person_sam_williams"
    ],
    "events": [
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_initial_slack",
        "channel": "slack",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:12:34-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "message": "Hey Jordan, Sam – we need to get a planning session on the books for Main Product to go over current progress and next steps for the upcoming sprint. Looking at next week, sometime Mon–Thu during the day. I’ll propose a few options over email so we can check calendars more easily.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_email_proposal",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:29:10-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Planning session for Main Product – find a 45-min slot next week",
        "body": "Hi Jordan and Sam,\n\nWe need a 45-minute planning session next week to review Main Product progress and agree on next steps for the next sprint.\n\nConstraints:\n- Next week (week of March 3)\n- During working hours Eastern (9a–6p)\n- All of us need to be available\n\nLooking at my calendar, I could potentially do:\n- Tue 3/4: 10:00–10:45, 11:30–12:15, or 15:00–15:45\n- Wed 3/5: 09:30–10:15 or 16:00–16:45\n- Thu 3/6: 11:00–11:45\n\nCan you both reply-all with the slots that work for you, and also flag anything I might be missing on your calendars? Once we converge, I’ll send a calendar invite.\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_calendar_snapshot_alex",
        "channel": "calendar_export",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:35:00-05:00",
        "owner": "person_alex_smith",
        "range_start": "2025-03-03T09:00:00-05:00",
        "range_end": "2025-03-07T18:00:00-05:00",
        "entries": [
          {
            "title": "1:1 with Taylor",
            "start": "2025-03-04T09:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T10:00:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Eng Standup",
            "start": "2025-03-04T10:45:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T11:15:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Design Critique",
            "start": "2025-03-05T10:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-05T11:30:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Product Sync",
            "start": "2025-03-06T09:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-06T10:00:00-05:00"
          }
        ],
        "notes": "Busy times indicate Alex is unavailable for additional meetings."
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_calendar_snapshot_jordan",
        "channel": "calendar_export",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:36:12-05:00",
        "owner": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "range_start": "2025-03-03T09:00:00-05:00",
        "range_end": "2025-03-07T18:00:00-05:00",
        "entries": [
          {
            "title": "Support Rotation",
            "start": "2025-03-04T09:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T10:30:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Backend Guild",
            "start": "2025-03-04T11:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T12:00:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Infra Planning",
            "start": "2025-03-05T09:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-05T10:00:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "1:1 with Manager",
            "start": "2025-03-05T16:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-05T17:00:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Doctor appointment",
            "start": "2025-03-06T10:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-06T11:30:00-05:00"
          }
        ],
        "notes": "Jordan generally avoids meetings starting after 5pm ET."
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_calendar_snapshot_sam",
        "channel": "calendar_export",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:37:02-05:00",
        "owner": "person_sam_williams",
        "range_start": "2025-03-03T09:00:00-05:00",
        "range_end": "2025-03-07T18:00:00-05:00",
        "entries": [
          {
            "title": "Code Review Block",
            "start": "2025-03-04T15:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T16:30:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Team Standup",
            "start": "2025-03-05T09:15:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-05T09:45:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Interview Loop",
            "start": "2025-03-05T15:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-05T17:00:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Errand (OOO)",
            "start": "2025-03-06T11:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-06T13:00:00-05:00"
          }
        ],
        "notes": "Sam prefers mornings but can do afternoons except where blocked."
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_jordan_email_reply",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:02:44-05:00",
        "from": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product – find a 45-min slot next week",
        "body": "Thanks Alex.\n\nLooking at my calendar for next week:\n- Tue 3/4: I’m busy 9:00–10:30 and 11:00–12:00, so 10:00–10:45 and 11:30–12:15 don’t really work. I *can* do 15:00–15:45 on Tue.\n- Wed 3/5: I have Infra Planning 9:00–10:00 and would rather not jump directly into another call, but 09:30–10:15 won’t work anyway. 16:00–16:45 is fine for me.\n- Thu 3/6: I’m out late morning for a doctor’s appointment 10:30–11:30, so 11:00–11:45 doesn’t work.\n\nSo my preferences, in order:\n1) Wed 3/5, 16:00–16:45\n2) Tue 3/4, 15:00–15:45\n\nHappy with either.\n\n– Jordan",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_sam_email_reply",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:21:09-05:00",
        "from": "person_sam_williams",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_jordan_johnson"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product – find a 45-min slot next week",
        "body": "Hey both,\n\nFrom Alex’s options:\n- Tue 3/4: I’m clear until 15:30, but I’d rather not run directly into my 15:30–16:30 code review block. 10:00–10:45 or 11:30–12:15 would be fine. 15:00–15:45 is not great for me since it cuts too close.\n- Wed 3/5: I’ve got standup 9:15–9:45 and an interview block 15:00–17:00. So 09:30–10:15 overlaps standup, but 16:00–16:45 doesn’t work either because I’m interviewing then.\n- Thu 3/6: 11:00–11:45 conflicts with an errand I need to run starting 11:30.\n\nSo for me the best slots are:\n1) Tue 3/4, 10:00–10:45\n2) Tue 3/4, 11:30–12:15\n\nIf neither of those works for everyone, we might have to look at a different day/slot.\n\n– Sam",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_alex_followup_slack",
        "channel": "slack",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:45:31-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "message": "Thanks for the replies on email. Looks like:\n- Jordan: Wed 3/5 16:00–16:45 (pref #1), Tue 3/4 15:00–15:45 (pref #2)\n- Sam: Tue 3/4 10:00–10:45 or 11:30–12:15\n\nI’ll scan our calendars again and see if there’s a 45-min slot next week that works for all three of us. May need to go outside the initial list I sent.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_alex_personal_scan_note",
        "channel": "internal_note",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:02:10-05:00",
        "author": "person_alex_smith",
        "content": "Looking for a 45-min slot next week (Mar 3–7) for planning with Jordan + Sam.\n\nCross-checking calendars:\n- Tue 3/4: \n  * Jordan busy 9:00–10:30, 11:00–12:00\n  * Sam wants to avoid 15:00–15:45 because of 15:30–16:30 code review block\n  * I have a 9:30–10:00 1:1 and 10:45–11:15 standup\n  => No contiguous 45-min where all are free.\n- Wed 3/5:\n  * Jordan busy 9:00–10:00 and 16:30–17:00\n  * Sam busy 9:15–9:45 and 15:00–17:00\n  * I’m busy 10:30–11:30\n  => 16:00–16:45 conflicts with Sam’s interview; mornings also overlap.\n- Thu 3/6:\n  * Jordan 10:30–11:30 appt\n  * Sam 11:30–13:00 errand\n  * I’m 9:00–10:00 Product Sync\n  => Possible 13:00–13:45 window; need to confirm.\n\nTentative: Thu 3/6, 13:00–13:45 ET looks open for all three. Will propose via email and then send calendar invite if they confirm.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_alex_email_proposed_slot",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:15:55-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product – proposing Thu 3/6",
        "body": "Hi both,\n\nI looked a bit more broadly at our calendars next week.\n\nThe only 45-minute slot I can find that seems to work for all three of us, within working hours, is:\n- Thu 3/6, 13:00–13:45 ET\n\nCan you please confirm that this time works? If so, I’ll send a calendar invite titled “Main Product – Sprint Planning / Next Steps” and include a short agenda.\n\nBest,\nAlex",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_jordan_confirmation",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:24:03-05:00",
        "from": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product – proposing Thu 3/6",
        "body": "Thu 3/6, 13:00–13:45 ET works for me.\n\nThanks for doing the calendar Tetris.\n\n– Jordan",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_sam_confirmation",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:28:47-05:00",
        "from": "person_sam_williams",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_jordan_johnson"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product – proposing Thu 3/6",
        "body": "Works for me as well. 13:00–13:45 ET on Thu 3/6 is free on my side.\n\n– Sam",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_calendar_invite_created",
        "channel": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:40:12-05:00",
        "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
        "participants": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "event": {
          "title": "Main Product – Sprint Planning / Next Steps",
          "description": "45-minute planning meeting to discuss current progress on Main Product and align on next sprint goals and immediate next steps.\n\nProposed agenda:\n1) Review current sprint status\n2) Identify blockers and dependencies\n3) Agree on scope for next sprint\n4) Assign owners for follow-ups",
          "start": "2025-03-06T13:00:00-05:00",
          "end": "2025-03-06T13:45:00-05:00",
          "location": "Zoom (link in invite)",
          "timezone": "America/New_York"
        },
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_final_slack_note",
        "channel": "slack",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:42:33-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "message": "Invite sent for our Main Product planning: Thu 3/6, 1:00–1:45pm ET. Thanks for juggling calendars – we’ll use it to lock in next sprint goals and immediate next steps.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      }
    ]
  }
]

  {
    "id": "noise_release_notes_thread",
    "type": "release_planning",
    "seed": 550921,
    "description": "Discussion about preparing release notes for a minor release.",
    "participants": [
      "person_alex_smith",
      "person_jordan_johnson",
      "person_sam_williams"
    ],
    "events": [
      {
        "id": "noise_evt_release_slack_1",
        "channel": "slack",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-22T13:15:09-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "message": "I’m putting together notes for the 2.3.1 patch release. Can you each DM me a quick bullet list of anything user-visible that went out in your areas over the last 2 weeks?",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "noise_evt_release_slack_2",
        "channel": "slack",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-22T13:19:51-05:00",
        "from": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith"
        ],
        "message": "- Improved error handling for payment failures\n- Added logging around signup funnel\n- Fixed bug where profile pictures sometimes didn’t load on slow connections",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
